text: 🐈‍⬛🐈🐕Sun Plaza Park Dog Run is a great place where residents living nearby can have a space for their dogs to run around leash-free and to socialise with other dogs and their owners.
It has become our go to dog run as it’s probably one of the best dog run so far! Clean, no mud and no longer infested with ants like it used to be!

Many dog owners need to learn how to pick up after their pets after using the dog run. There should not be more than one dog at a time in the dog run to avoid dog fights. Good park with irresponsible pet owners.
Nice spacious dog run with a water point, however there are many ants there that bite, do check your dogs' paws when you're at this dog run
